wikipedia_page.main: James Henry Charles (5 January 1851 – 27 August 1906) was a British impressionist artist.

response: In Paris he enrolled as a student at the Académie Julian under the tutors, Lefebvre and Boulanger and in 1884 and 1885 he was accepted at the Salon (Paris). Here he would meet up with his friends, William and Edward Stott, Henry Herbert La Thangue and James Charles, who were also studying in Paris.
* Darby and Joan, a painting () by James Charles (painter)

link_mentions.page: List of artists in the Web Gallery of Art (A–K)
response: *James Charles (1851–1906), 1 painting : The Picnic, Museum and Art Gallery, Warrington (url)
James Charles (born 1999) is an American YouTuber and makeup artist.
James Charles may also refer to:
* James Charles (footballer) (1851–1939), Australian footballer, Richmond Football Club administrator
* Sir James Charles (sea captain) (1865–1928), British ocean-liner captain
